about_the_game:
Lost Whispers is a terrifying, asymmetrical multiplayer horror game where you must survive the eerie presence of a Creature, Your goal is to rescue trapped survivors by completing dangerous tasks and unlocking sealed rooms. Use your in-game microphone to guide survivors to safety—but be careful. Every sound you make could alert the creature to your presence.

Experience the horror through a VHS, Bodycam-style perspective, blending the gritty, immersive feel of found footage with the unsettling isolation of being watched through a handheld device

  • Asymmetrical multiplayer or Play with AI

    One player becomes the terrifying creature while others play as survivors.

  • Up to 4 players:

    Play with friends or alone with AI as you take on the challenge of outlasting the terror.

  • Proximity chat:

    Use real-time voice to coordinate, but be cautious—your sound could attract the creature

  • Task-based survival:

    Complete objectives to unlock the survivors' escape and avoid a deadly fate

Can you outsmart the creature, rescue the survivors, and escape the cursed grounds? Or will the whispers of the lost consume you?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or Higher / AMD Radeon R9 390 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
